name: node-bootstrap3-template
description: a template for express, node.js, and twitter bootstrap 3
readme:
## quick start

1. `$ git clone git@github.com:mjhea0/node-bootstrap3-template.git your_app`
2. `$ cd your_app`
3. `$ npm install`
4. `$ node app`

### desktop version
